abstracts.cdata!:
The long-term development objective of
            the Mexico School-Based Management Project is to improve the
            quality of education as measured by coverage, social
            participation, and educational outcomes. The project has
            three components: Component 1, school grants; Component 2,
            monitoring and program oversight; and Component 3, policy
            development and evaluation.
